C:/home/LearnHVAC/spark/class/sensor_generic_offset_bfdDynamics.cm File Reference

Detailed Description

generic sensor (with offset and dynamics, x values between 0 and 1) Brian Coffey, May28-08 dynamics based on formulation: x = x0 + integral( ((x_steadyState - x)/timeConstant) dt ) note that xdot is a bit of a misnomer - to use the standard integrators for this case, xdot = (x_steadyState - x)/timeConstant
